text: I'm REALLY enjoying the RA compilation of the best sets from the Movement festival in Detroit this Memorial day wknd. This is the only stage at the festival that's not outside; it's basically a concrete bunker that gets exceedingly loud and sweaty. These take me back to some good times: <https://www.residentadvisor.net/features/2996>

attachments.title: The RA Underground Stage in pictures and mixes
attachments.text: Techno was on the menu at Movement in Detroit, and we were there to capture sets by Altstadt Echo, Function, Ryan Elliott, STERAC, DJ Hyperactive, Rebekah, Ben Sims and Truncate.
attachments.fallback: Resident Advisor: The RA Underground Stage in pictures and mixes
